meanings.sent1: I drew many dodecagons in my math class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had colorful dodecagons painted on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The baker made a cake in the shape of dodecagons for the math party.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a beautiful array of dodecagons, each representing a different flower.
meanings.sent5: The dodecagons in the puzzle were tricky to fit together.

meanings.definition: A shape with twelve straight sides and twelve angles.
meanings.sent1: The stained glass window featured intricate dodecagons.
meanings.sent2: The new building had a unique design with dodecagons on its facade.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a sculpture using dodecagons stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a silhouette of dodecagons against the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry box had a dodecagons pattern etched into its lid.
